REG_001.query: select daydate,date_format(now(),'%Y%m%d'),count(*) from #d.fact_registereduser where type = 'Registration' and brandid='#b' group by daydate order by daydate desc limit 1;

SUBS_001.query: select daydate,date_format(now(),'%Y%m%d'),subscriptionid, count(*) from #d.fact_registereduser where type = 'Subscription' and brandid='#b' and daydate = (select max(daydate) from #d.fact_registereduser)  group by daydate,subscriptionid order by count(*) desc limit 10;

PLAY_001.query: select daydate,date_format(now(),'%Y%m%d'), count(*) from #d.fact_playbackactivity group by daydate order by daydate desc limit 7;
